page.title: 11School Life,Evesham.
page.content: {School starts}at 9 a.m. each weekday and{ends at 3.25p.m.}Before assembly each day my teacher gives us a type of {spelling exercise called dictation.}In {assembly}we sing hymns and say prayers. Every day we do{reading,} {writing and maths.}My very{best things at school each day are: Monday, art and craft or hockey; Tuesday P.E. or gym; Wednesday we have games groups when I goto another gym session, other choices are tennis, rounders, non-stop cricket (football, hockey, netball, dancing in Autumn and Spring); Thursday I bring my bike for Cycling Proficiency Club, other clubs are needlework, woodwork, local history, computers, science; we also have swimming at thelocal swimming baths; Friday the best thing at School is performing plays in front of the rest of the School.
